game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and return the ancient artifact to quest giver.
game.description: In a nearby village, rumors speak of an ancient artifact hidden in ruins. Retrieve it and bring it back to the quest giver.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a magical amulet

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins.
task.description: Explore the area until you find the hidden entrance to the ancient ruins.
task.location: The western forest, near the old oak tree

task.description: A fierce beast guards the artifact. Defeat it to claim the artifact.
task.location: In the heart of the ruins
